project.name: C-C805B-PSQL-08-ST03-DT06-DF09-CF23-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C805B-PSQL-08-ST03-DT06-DF09-CF23-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: initalize a database Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887

scoring_formula.formula: (UTF8 OR ASCII) AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C805B-PSQL-08-ST03-DT06-DF09-CF23-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: perform a select Good inputs:1) envrionment variable is set to a value whose length is less than or equal to 8 charsBad inputs:1) environment variable is not set2) environment variable is set to a value whose length is greater than 8 chars

process.script: sleep 22 && $SS_TC_DEPS/bin/psql -h ss-localhost -d booktown -p 8432 -c "SELECT * FROM books WHERE title = 'Dune'"

/opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="a" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
if [[ -s "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid" ]]; then kill $(cat "$SS_TC_ROOT/$SS_TC_INSTALL/postgres.pid"); else echo "Skipping postgres kill, no PID file."; fi;

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-02 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
